descriptionHtml:
Lashmaker: A Modder's Resource

This pack was made with people who are doing high resolution eye retextures in mind.
A lot of attention to detail is being placed on the eye textures themselves, but the alpha channels are still scaled up defaults. This is a fix for the issue.

There are two sizes, 512x and 1024x. Pick the size which matched your scaled up eye retexture and paste the appropriate file into your eye alpha channel and save as DXT5ARGB.

The ReadMe has detailed instructions.

The Paint dot Net Version has black eyelashes on a transparent background for people who use that program. They can be pasted directly into your image.
IF THE PAINTdotNET VERSION LOOKS TOO THIN: Simply paste it in again, or make a duplicate layer. This will thicken them up.

Enjoy :)

AS OF 07-14-2018 THIS MAY ONLY BE USED FOR PERSONAL MODIFICATIONS AND NO LONGER PUBLICLY SHARED..
If you don't like this change, thank the moderators for siding with plagiarizers and lying thieves on this site.
author: Mr Dave
